Module com.example.breakout_clone
Package com.example.breakout_clone.wrappers

Class Sprite

java.lang.Object
com.example.breakout_clone.wrappers.Sprite
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ball, Brick, Paddle, PowerUp
public abstract class Sprite extends Object
Abstract wrapper class for storing the SpriteModel, SpriteController and the SpriteView. It reduces the clutter in code for when creating MVC for different sprite object
Author:
Praket Chavan
